description: When cast or discarded, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Scrap Scuttler</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When cast or discarded, summon a Scrap Scuttler.
flavorText: With a handful of scrap and mere moments left, the young inventor recalled an unusual source of inspiration: a creature she once saw scuttling along the rivers of a distant jungle.
name: Jury-Rig
